title: More Fans = More Better?
description: *Thank you Bequiet for sponsoring the video. Check out the MAJESTIC Bequiet Silent Wing Pro 4s here (Affiliate link):   A very simple idea, does adding more fans to your CPU cooler give you bettter temps?  Get some AWESOME Dawid merch here:   Join this channel and help us buy weird computers and tech to make videos on:   Or you can support the channel on Patreon:   -Follow me on whichever Social media you don't hate- Discord:  Twitch:  Twitch bits on YouTube:
